thread.title: Lady GaGa: Lady Gaga takes subtle dig at Donald Trump at Super Bowl show | English Movie News
thread.title_full: Lady GaGa: Lady Gaga takes subtle dig at Donald Trump at Super Bowl show | English Movie News - Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Lady GaGa: Lady Gaga takes subtle dig at Donald Trump at Super Bowl show | English Movie News
text:
Singer Lady Gaga delivered a power-packed performance during her Super Bowl 51 half-time show, but played it safe with subtle political undertones.
Gaga performed without a single special guest performer and focused on her biggest hits.
She earlier promised to be politically charged in the wake of protests against US President Donald Trump .
Although her lyrics included phrases like 'black, white and beige' and 'gay, straight, or bi, lesbian, transgendered life', there appeared to be no direct attack on Trump.
Lady Gaga at Super Bowl: Easy on the politics, high on the energetic performance! Hits like 'Poker Face' & 'Just Dance' came off well, but her best performance came in the 'Million Reasons'.
Gaga opened the half-time show with a poignant medley of 'America the beautiful' and 'This land is our land' -- an alternative national anthem .
The subtle dig wasn't missed by one viewer - Hillary Clinton .
The former Presidential candidate, who lost out to Trump in the Presidential elections, tweeted her praise for Gaga.
"I'm one of 100 million Super Bowl fans that just went Gaga for the Lady, amd her message to all of us," she tweeted.
I'm one of 100 million #SuperBowl fans that just went #Gaga for the Lady, & her message to all of us. https://t.co/8AoNqjwr1b
â€” Hillary Clinton (@HillaryClinton) February 6, 2017
Caught & clicked: Lady Gaga smoking marijuana on stage! 01:17
